name: Silent Night (itch) (DkUniverseYT)
description:
v1.0.0.2

Welcome To Silent Night! Basic Story: The world has been covered in darkness for over 2 years, and strange unexplained creatures of all kinds have began appearing all across the planet. What happened? Why is it dark? Where did these creatures come from? Will you find the light at the end of the tunnel? Find out in Silent Night! 

In-Game Controls: 

Mouse: Aim Click or Space: Shoot

 U: Open Upgrade Wheel 

1-6: Upgrade Attacks and Use Attacks 

Bunker Controls: 

WASD: Move 

Space or E: Interact 

Please Don't Share You Save Codes In The Comments! Please Report Any Bugs Found In The Comments! Thank You So Much And Enjoy Silent Night!
